mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ChattingRoom (chatting_room_id, user_id, user_id2, room_id, created_id, updated_id) VALUES (#{chatting_room_id}, #{user_id}, #{user_id2}, #{room_id}, #{created_id}, #{updated_id})
mapper.select: SELECT cr.*, cm.chat_date, cm.chat_ctt, u.user_name, pi.profile_img_url FROM ChattingRoom cr JOIN ChattingMessage cm ON cr.chatting_room_id = cm.chatting_room_id JOIN User u ON cm.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN ProfileImg pi ON cm.user_id = pi.user_id WHERE (cr.user_id = #{user_id} OR cr.user_id2 = #{user_id}) AND cm.chat_date = ( SELECT MAX(chat_date) FROM ChattingMessage WHERE chatting_room_id = cr.chatting_room_id );
